alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 18 at 4:36AM EST until December 18 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Water levels are running about 1.0 feet above the predicted tides across the Middle Keys. This is resulting in water levels above 1 foot around the hours of high tide. * WHERE...Middle Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
